TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SerializationInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 儲存序列化或還原序列化物件所需的所有資料。

span.span: Stores all the data needed to serialize or deserialize an object.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會使用自訂序列化行為的物件。This class is used by objects with custom serialization behavior. 上的方法或是填入存放區名稱、 類型和值的每一份要序列化的資訊。The method on either or populates the store with the name, type, and value of each piece of information it wants to serialize. 還原序列化期間，適當的函式可以擷取這項資訊。During deserialization, the appropriate function can extract this information. 物件會加入至儲存在序列化時，使用方法並擷取自儲存在還原序列化使用方法。Objects are added to the store at serialization time using the methods and extracted from the store at deserialization using the methods. 如需有關自訂序列化的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 自訂序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/custom-serialization.md)。For more information about customizing serialization, see [Custom Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/custom-serialization.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範自訂的序列化和還原序列化的各種不同的值。The following code example demonstrates the for custom serialization and deserialization of various values. [!code-cpp[ISerializable Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISerializable Interface Example/CPP/iobjectreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ISerializable Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISerializable Interface Example/CS/iobjectreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ISerializable Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISerializable Interface Example/VB/iobjectreference.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當做`converter`參數將資料從其內部表示法轉換成要求之使用者的表單。The passed as the `converter` parameter converts data from its internal representation to the form the user requested. 資料中的內部表示法取決於建立它的格式器。The internal representation of the data within the depends on the formatter that created it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果加入的兩個值的差異只在於名稱情況下，任何例外狀況會擲回，這不是建議的做法。If two values are added with names that differ only by case, no exception will be thrown, which is not a recommended practice. 不過，加入與名稱完全相同的兩個值將會造成擲回。However, adding two values with the exact same name will cause the to be thrown.

summary.span: 將值新增至 存放區，其中 與 建立關聯，並序列化為 。

span.span: Adds a value into the store, where is associated with and is serialized as being of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指派的類型一定是物件的型別或其中一個其父代。The assigned type is always the type of the object, or one of its parents. 如果加入的兩個值的差異只在於名稱情況下，任何例外狀況會擲回，這不是建議的做法。If two values are added with names that differ only by case, no exception will be thrown, which is not a recommended practice. 不過，加入與名稱完全相同的兩個值將會造成擲回。However, adding two values with the exact same name will cause the to be thrown.

span.span: If or is .
A value has already been associated with .

MemberSignature.Value: public string AssemblyName { get; set; }
.property instance string AssemblyName
Public Property AssemblyName As String
public: property System::String ^ AssemblyName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AssemblyName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定僅在序列化期間序列化之型別的組件名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the assembly name of the type to serialize during serialization only.

value.span: 要序列之型別的組件完整名稱。

span.span: The full name of the assembly of the type to serialize.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的值相同屬於包含類型的組件的屬性。The is the same as the value returned by property of the assembly of the containing type. 這是格式器在序列化此物件的型別資訊時所使用的組件名稱。This is the assembly name that the formatter uses when serializing type information for this object. 組件名稱包含組件、 版本、 文化特性和一些安全性物件的相關資訊的名稱。The assembly name contains the name of the assembly, version, culture, and some security information about the object. 要變更 （例如傳送特定類型的 proxy） 正在序列化的類型的使用者將會設定這個屬性的值。Users who are changing the type being serialized (for example, to send a proxy for a particular type) will set the value of this property. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿還原序列化期間使用這個屬性，因為這個屬性的值會是未定義。Do not use this property during deserialization because the value of this property is undefined.

span.span: The value the property is set to is .

.property instance string FullTypeName
Public Property FullTypeName As String
public: property System::String ^ FullTypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.FullTypeName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要序列化之 的完整名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the full name of the to serialize.

value.span: 要序列化之型別的完整名稱。

span.span: The full name of the type to serialize.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 等同於將呼叫會傳回什麼上。The is the same as what would be returned by calling the on . 這是序列化此物件的類型資訊時使用的格式子的型別名稱。This is the type name the formatter uses when serializing type information for this object. 要變更的類型 （例如傳送特定類型的 proxy） 序列化的使用者會想要設定這個屬性的值。Users who are changing the type to serialize (for example, to send a proxy for a particular type) will want to set the value of this property. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿還原序列化期間使用這個屬性，因為這個屬性的值會是未定義。Do not use this property during deserialization because the value of this property is undefined.

exception.span: 要設定的這個屬性值為 。

span.span: The value this property is set to is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料儲存在是要求的型別 （或其衍生的類別），可以直接傳回的值。If the data stored in the is of the type requested (or one of its derived classes), that value is returned directly. 否則，呼叫以將它轉換成適當的型別。Otherwise, is called to convert it to the appropriate type. 所傳回的值方法可以永遠安全地轉換成在指定的型別`type`參數。The value returned by the method can always be safely cast to the type specified in the `type` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法：The following code example demonstrates the use of the method: [!code-cpp[Classic SerializationInfo.GetValue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SerializationInfo.GetValue Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SerializationInfo.GetValue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SerializationInfo.GetValue Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SerializationInfo.GetValue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SerializationInfo.GetValue Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 負責設定的執行個體，再將其傳遞給。The is responsible for setting the of the instance before passing it to . 不過，想要傳送其物件的 proxy 使用者必須變更所表示的型別執行個體。However, users who want to send proxies for their objects will need to change the type represented by this instance. 使用方法就相當於設定兩者而。Using the method is equivalent to setting both the and the . ## Examples [!code-cpp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CPP/iobjectreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CS/iobjectreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/VB/iobjectreference.vb#1)]
